title: Construction Project Manager
job_overview:
Position Summary:
We are seeking an experienced and detail-oriented Project Manager to lead and coordinate signage projects from inception to completion. This role requires strong organizational skills, the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, and a customer-first mindset. The ideal candidate will be adept at working across internal teams and with external vendors to ensure projects are delivered on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards.

Key Responsibilities:
Manage multiple sign projects nationally, from kickoff to closeout, ensuring timely delivery and budget adherence
Serve as the primary point of contact for clients, vendors, contractors, and internal teams
Interpret client needs and translate them into actionable plans, including scope, timeline, and resource allocation
Coordinate with design, engineering, manufacturing, permitting, and installation teams
Track project milestones, budgets, and schedules using project management software
Ensure compliance with municipal permitting processes and regulations nationwide
Manage vendor relationships and subcontractor assignments across different markets
Conduct regular project status meetings and provide progress updates to clients and internal stakeholders
Troubleshoot issues and proactively resolve delays, quality concerns, or scope changes
Maintain accurate documentation including contracts, drawings, permits, and change orders
Ensure all safety and quality standards are adhered to during the installation process

Qualifications:
3+ years of project management experience in signage, construction, or related industries (preferred)
Strong understanding of signage production and installation processes
Familiarity with permitting and code compliance for exterior signage across various municipalities
Excellent communication, leadership, and organizational skills
Ability to multitask and manage deadlines across multiple concurrent projects
Proficiency in project management tools (e.g., Microsoft Project, Upgrade to see actual info, Asana, etc.)
Knowledge of Adobe Illustrator, AutoCAD, or similar software is a plus
PMP Certification or similar credential is a plus
Bachelorâ€™s degree in Project Management, Construction Management, Business, or related field (preferred)
